meanings.definition: Not normal; deviating from the usual or typical
meanings.sent1: The abnormals behavior of the cat startled the owner.
meanings.sent2: The sky turned abnormals shades of purple during the sunset.
meanings.sent3: The abnormals color of the cake made it look like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: Her abnormals talent for painting left everyone in awe.
meanings.sent5: The abnormals sound of the wind howling kept me up all night.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that is abnormal
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the abnormals to understand their condition.
meanings.sent2: The zoo had a special exhibit featuring various abnormals.
meanings.sent3: The abnormals in the circus always amazed the audience with their tricks.
meanings.sent4: She felt like an abnormals in a world of conformity.
meanings.sent5: The abnormals of the forest whispered secrets to those who listened.
